sub_title: European Technology Industry Leader @ Mercer | Business Development | Commercial Growth | Strategic Account Management | Information Products | Management Consulting

treasury_media.title: UAE businesses prove resilient despite Covid-19
treasury_media.description: The direct impact of Covid-19 on the compensation and benefits landscape is less drastic than initially feared, according to the 2020 UAE Total Remuneration Survey (TRS) by Mercer. Even though 10% of UAE companies reduced salaries on a temporary...

treasury_media.title: Thirty per cent of UAE companies 'plan' workforce cuts: survey
treasury_media.description: Nearly 20 per cent of UAE companies freeze 2020 salary hikes says Mercer survey

treasury_media.title: Around 70% companies in the GCC to review compensation and benefits amid virus fallout
treasury_media.description: Around 81 per cent of GCC-based companies have or plan to make adjustments to their compensation and benefits programmes, whereas 53 per cent of internationally headquartered companies have also made or plan to take similar action

profile_positions.description:
Led mid-7-figure information products business for European tech industry (25 countries), including strategy, business development, sales, product influence, public speaking, and media relations. Reports to Partner, Workforce Products Division, Europe. 
• Received mobility sponsorship to relocate from Dubai to Amsterdam to undertake current role. 
• On track to deliver 30%+ YOY tech industry revenue growth in 2022. Beat all quarterly goals. 
• Led Comptryx (global tech industry compensation, workforce metrics and labor cost product) across Europe. Drove sales, product, operations and support improvements. Increased YOY YTD new sales 40%. Grew client base 45%+. Maintained 85% retention rate. Implemented client experience metrics. 
• Established digital networks of senior rewards leaders and decision-makers in fintech and gaming verticals. Enabled new sector entry, relationship development and increased product awareness, demand generation, and voice-of-customer research. 
• Ideated and executed go-to-market strategy to repackage tech industry content of Talent All Access® product, bundle it with Comptryx, and price pair attractively for tech start and scale-ups. Created $2 million opportunity. Enhanced sector specific value proposition. 
• Partnered with MercerMarsh Benefits (MMC subsidiary JV) to launch Comptryx in Eastern Europe. Developed new sales channel. Implemented referral compensation program. Provided product and sales training. Removed historical intercompany silo. Penetrated new geo markets. 
• Presented to regional and global audiences of 500+ rewards and C-level executives on European tech industry talent and rewards trends, and other topics. 
• Led the exploration and analysis of complex client challenges; and subsequent opportunity shaping, proposal writing, and opportunity conversion by demonstrating a deep and comprehensive understanding of the client’s issues and effectively positioning a suite of solutions to solve them.
profile_positions.title: Principal, European Technology Industry Leader

profile_positions.description:
Led mid-7-figure total remuneration survey and productized consulting business across industries for MENA (17 countries). Served multinational and local clients. Represented Mercer with media. Managed 8-person team, 3 directs. Reported to Partner, Workforce Consulting Division, MENA. 
• Delivered 10%+ YOY revenue growth in pandemic economy. Beat goals. 
• Launched region’s first digital human capital network for early and growth-stage tech companies. Converted 80% prospects to client relationships.
• Led end-to-end product management for new survey assessing pandemic’s impact on compensation, benefits, and workforces. Addressed critical Covid-19 and future-of-work issues for employers. Published, promoted, and presented results to clients, prospects and media. 
• Guided and coached team members. Achieved 100% retention throughout tenure.
• Designed and implemented data validation process for MENA surveys (40 surveys, +2.000 companies) in Tableau. Used data visualizations to identify and rectify quality issues. Reduced time to validate 50%. Increased data accuracy 50%. Reallocated resources to revenue-generating activities. 
• Produced branded, semi-annual, 1-day human capital forums for top and emerging companies in 3 industries. Delivered keynotes. 
• Managed key client relationship with HR and Executive Management for leading public sector, private sector and semi-government organizations.
• Frequently represented Mercer as a reward and talent expert in print, online and broadcast coverage including Virgin Radio, Arabian Business, The National, Gulf News, MSN, Zawya, etc.
• Presented detailed project findings and recommendations to Executive Management, Remuneration Committees and Directors of the Board.
profile_positions.title: Workforce Products Leader - MENA (May 2020 to May 2021), Senior Associate (April 2019 to April 2020)

profile_positions.description:
Produced $1+ million of annual consulting and product revenue in the United Arab Emirates and other MENA countries. Served global, regional, and local executive and Board clients. Reported to Partner, Workforce Consulting Division, MENA.  
• Selected as 1 of 10 Top Performers in Growth Markets to participate in Mercer’s Next Generation Leadership Rotation Program. Undertook this as an international assignment (November 2016 to October 2017) in Dubai, UAE and localized after 6 months.
• Sold and managed 6-figure, 3-to-6-month, executive and employee rewards consulting engagements (job evaluation, grading/structure design, benchmarking). Managed 2 to 3 consultants per project. Beat annual revenue, profitability and utilization goals. 
• Owned end-to-end process for total remuneration surveys for 7 countries (marketing events, sales, data collection and analysis, publications, debrief events, client support). Delivered 20% annual growth in sales and country databases.
• Developed and executed customer acquisition strategy to establish new client relationships with tech start-up and growth companies across the Middle East. 
• Collaborated with Warsaw operations center to segment service team into client-facing and data analysis roles, in line with strengths and preferences. Improved performance in both arenas. 
• Hosted country events, industry forums, and client roundtables as a global, regional, and local rewards subject matter expert.
profile_positions.title: Associate (May 2017 to April 2019) and Consultant (Nov 2016 to April 2017)

profile_positions.description:
Owned end-to-end process for all survey products in 5 key markets, including Nigeria, Kenya, Tanzania, Zimbabwe and Botswana. Reported to Senior Principal, Workforce Products Division, SSA.
• Led 5 surveys annually (managing data collection, analysis and account management of 350+ companies). Averaged 20% growth and 90% client retention annually.
• Developed Total Cash Surveys for “pre-emerging” markets (Mali, Togo, Niger, Chad, Sierra Leone, Burundi, Sudan, etc.). Enabled geo expansion and launch of new products. 
• Advised multinationals expanding into Africa on local rewards practices and structures.  
• Delivered up-to-20 Mercer HR Academy workshops annually. Built HR capability, drove demand for data products, and created influencer/decision-maker relationships.
• Pitched successful business case to CEO to fund an offshore SSA client services team. Led team implementation practices (incl. recruiting, onboarding, training and development). 
• Took lead in implementing Mercer’s business model, operations, and resources following 2013 GRS acquisition. Expedited post-transaction integration and product adaptation.
profile_positions.title: Consultant (2016), Analyst (2015), Junior Analyst (2014)
